```{r, echo=F}
library(readxl)
library(DT)
data <- read_excel("data.xlsx", sheet = "お名前、ご所属、Twitter")

datatable(data,
          options=list(pageLength = 25,
                       autoWidth = TRUE,
                       columnDefs = list(
                  list(width = '200px', targets = c(1:3)))))
```
